Name: Veggie Rice
Description: A deliciously sweet mini cob of golden corn, served with steamed Tex Mex rice, fresh lettuce, chopped tomatoes and a bean salsa, drizzled with sour cream sauce. Light, filling and delicious. Served with a drink.

Name: Zinger Rice
Description: One piece of our fiery Zinger chicken with steamed Tex Mex rice, fresh lettuce and a bean salsa, drizzled with sour cream sauce. Light, filling and spicy.

Name: Zinger Burger
Description: Our simple, succulent 100% chicken breast Fillet burger, plus spine-tingling Zing. With regular fries and a regular drink.

Name: Kids PopCorn Chicken
Description: Our one hundred chicken breast Popcorn Chicken pieces. A fun, bite-sized snack.

Name: Boneless Banquet
Description: A banquet of three chicken breast Mini Fillets, plus Popcorn Chicken, regular fries, regular side, one Johnny's burger Original Dip and drink. A fuss-free dipper's delight.

Name: Boneless Dips
Description: Four of our chicken breast Mini Fillets, with two Johnny's burger Original Dips, a regular side and drink. A no-fuss feast.

Name: Mighty Bucket
Description: Two pieces of Original Recipe chicken, two chicken breast Mini Fillets and a pair of spicy hot wings.

Name: Zinger Stacker
Description: Made with two fiery zinger fillets, topped with two slices of cheese, supercharger and sweet chilli sauce. Fiery and delicious. With regular fries and drink.

Name: 6 Piece Wicked Variety
Description: Eight hot wings, six pieces of Original Recipe chicken and four chicken breast Mini Fillets, with four regular fries. A full-on fiery family feast.

Name: 14 Piece Bargain
Description: A bumper bargain bucket of fourteen pieces of our famous Original Recipe chicken pieces, with four regular fries. A feast fit for the whole family.

Name: 14 Piece Party
Description: It's the ultimate Johnny's burger bucket! Fourteen pieces of our famous Original Recipe chicken, with eight  chicken breast Mini Fillets, eight Hot Wings, one large Popcorn Chicken, two large sides and six regular fries, plus a large bottle of drink for sharing. The most delicious way to cater for any party.

Name: 10 Piece Wicked
Description: Eight hot wings, ten pieces of Original Recipe chicken and four chicken breast Mini Fillets, with four regular fries. A full-on fiery family feast.

Name: REGULAR FRIES
Description: Golden french fries. Unsalted so you can have them how you like them

Name: Corn Cob
Description: A deliciously sweet mini cob of golden corn. Suitable for vegetarians

Name: Popcorn Chicken
Description: Our chicken breast Popcorn Chicken pieces. A fun, bite-sized snack.

Name: Regular Beans
Description: Baked beans with a hint of Kentucky BBQ sauce. The simple family favourite

Name: Garden Salad
Description: A fresh and crunchy garden salad with sweetcorn, tomatoes and buttermilk dressing, that also provides one of your 5 a day.

Name: Cherry Sundae
Description: A smooth soft serve ice cream Sundae topped with irresistible cherry sauce

Name: Chocolate Sundae
Description: A little treat with smooth soft serve ice cream topped with irresistible chocolate sauce

Name: Caramel Waffle Krushem
Description: Our Krushem Soft Serve has waffle pieces and a caramel drizzle, topped with soft serve ice cream, more sauce and a chocolate bolo tie.

Name: 4 Cookies
Description: A pack of four classic chocolate chip cookies.

Name: Regular Pepsi
Description: The original Pepsi. Chilled and thirst-quenching

Name: Regular Diet Pepsi
Description: The low calorie alternative. Chilled and thirst-quenching.

Name: Regular 7UP
Description: The classic crisp lemon-lime sugar-free drink. Chilled and thirst-quenching.

Name: Regular Robinsons
Description: Made with real apple and blackcurrant juice. Revive and hydrate.

Name: Water
Description: Simple, essential, thirst-quenching.

Name: Hot Chocolate
Description: One of the nation's favourites. Smooth and deliciously warming Hot Chocolate.

Name: 12 Piece Dipping Boneless
Description: A feast of twelve chicken breast Mini Fillets plus Popcorn Chicken served with Original Dips, including Kentucky Smoky BBQ sauce, Original Hot Sauce, Sticky Sweet Chilli Sauce and Garlic Buttermilk Mayo.
